snippet: The battle over gay rights became a surprising subplot during Super Bowl week. A sportswriter, Chuck Culpepper, reflected on the issue in a personal way.
abstract: The battle over gay rights became a surprising subplot during Super Bowl week. A sportswriter, Chuck Culpepper, reflected on the issue in a personal way.

headline.main: A Sportswriter and the 'Gay Super Bowl'

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
